lexUnit.name: injure.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: do or undergo physical harm to; wound.

sentence.text: One young man recently told me about his emotionally disturbed mother , who attempted suicide but succeeded only in permanently injuring herself .
It was done to prevent her giving way to a compulsive wish to injure herself by picking at her skin .
` You wanted me to let her fall and injure herself ?
He has always been very bad about it , which is why he injured himself at Steve Hadley 's yard , and even now John has to dope him before he is clipped .
But within a few hours Mal was suffering exhaustion and Bill had injured himself falling on diamond-hard green ice on the Lhotse Face .
Bradl injured himself again at Calafat , a few weeks after the final GP .
A woman who kept a child home from school to mind the baby while she worked broke the law , and if she left the baby alone and it injured itself , she was also liable to prosecution .
Nevertheless , within the group of patients who injure themselves three subgroups can be discerned .
They know that we send them straight to the cells at An Dap now , no matter how badly they injure themselves .
When children injure themselves , it is important that you know how to give the right first aid treatment , quickly , quietly and with lots of reassurance to the child .
If you drive , you can injure or kill yourself or others .
It does n't matter if you injure yourself as long as you do n't injure the customer 's furniture .
Clare Wood has found herself restricted to doubles this week after injuring her right ankle in a basketball accident 10 days ago .
Sterland 's long exile began when he injured ankle ligaments in the game at Tottenham on March 7 .
He replaces Dave Mitchell , who injured his ankle while playing for Australia this week .
Top turret gunner , Bill Sartor , injured his arm in the turret mechanism and was out of action until March 22 .
At the end of 1971 , playing for a World XI in Australia , he badly injured his back when diving to attempt a catch and spent a month in hospital .
Jonsson , the 1990 world champion , who failed to agree terms last season , was lured back after Todd Wiltshire injured his back .
Mr Parfitt was in constant pain after severely injuring his back in a laboratory accident 22 years ago .
Graham Bradley , who injured a finger on Thursday , is also fit to take his National mount on Rowlandsons Jewels .
Hodge , who injured a hamstring training with England , is fit to return for Forest .
But she was alone when she climbed over the raised cot sides of her bed and crashed to the floor , injuring her head .
Uncharacteristically , he decided to gallop about , and freakishly collided with a shed , badly injuring his hock .
Centre Anthony Herbert also injured his neck when running into former Wallaby prop Matt Ryan in a Brisbane club match .
Krishna Pal , a 35 year old carpenter , injured his shoulder and one of Carey 's fellow missionaries , John Thomas , was called to give medical aid .
Scrum-half Brian Redpath injured his shoulder and will miss Sunday 's Test against Western Samoa while No 8 Carl Hogg suffered a broken nose and is unlikely to play .
Lt. Stirling injured his spine and also lost his sight for about an hour .
And last month an 18-year-old student at Lady Margaret Hall college broke a leg and injured her spine when she fell out of a window after a pub crawl .
A teenager has seriously injured his spine playing rugby at school .
He injured a knee early in December and , although he played for his club on Saturday , the selectors are not convinced he is ready to return .
When I injured the ligaments in my left knee last year , the doctor said I did n't need an operation but it would never be 100% again .
One player definitely missing this weekend is Llanelli and Wales B scrum-half and captain Rupert Moon , who injured his collarbone in the East Wales v West Wales match in Cardiff on Monday .
Chapman may have been seeking to ease the pressure on his players , but if he did entertain hopes of the Double , they were dashed when James injured a knee at Upton Park over Easter .
He injured his groin during the friendly with Ajax on Wednesday , but was improved yesterday .
PAUL ACCOLA , Switzerland 's alpine skiing world champion , will miss the Championships in Japan in February after surgery on his left knee , which he injured in training .
